profile.name: Tze Kai
profile.title: Undergraduate in Computing Science at SIT × University of Glasgow
profile.bio: Undergraduate in Computing Science at SIT × University of Glasgow. Passionate about aviation technology, autonomous systems, and building innovative solutions that bridge the gap between software and the physical world.

about.journey: I am currently pursuing a Bachelor of Science (Honours) in Computing Science at Singapore Institute of Technology, in partnership with the University of Glasgow. My passion lies at the intersection of aviation and technology.
about.journeyExtended: As the founder and President of SIT Aviation Society, I lead initiatives that bridge the gap between aviation enthusiasts and emerging technologies like drones and flight simulation. My experience spans from military leadership as a Platoon Commander in the Singapore Army to developing RPA solutions at Changi Airport Group.

achievements.text: NSF of The Year 2024 - Singapore Army

main.title: Presidential Garden Reception 2024
main.subtitle: Invited by the President of Singapore

experiences.description: Founded and lead the aviation interest group at Singapore Institute of Technology. Organize drone workshops, flight simulation experiences, and industry networking events. Building a community of aviation enthusiasts.
Led Motorisation Support Company (MSC) as Belrex (PCSV) Platoon Commander. Secondary appointment as Head of Drone Simulation Training. Managed company HR and logistics operations.
experiences.highlight: NSF of The Year 2024 · Presidential Garden Reception Invitee

experiences.description: Completed 19th Motorised Infantry Officer Course. Certified to operate Terrex Infantry Carrier Vehicle (ICV) as Operator and Vehicle Commander. Developed military leadership skills.
Migrated RPA processes to enterprise cloud UiPath Orchestrator. Designed and programmed RPA workflows for Airport Operations Management. Collaborated with cross-functional teams.
Built Robotic Process Automation solutions for Seletar Warehouse Team. Learned enterprise-grade automation development and UiPath best practices.
Led aviation enthusiast community with 100+ members. Supervised EXCO members and organized flight experiences, drone workshops, and industry visits to Changi Airport.

contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision. Whether it's aviation tech, automation, or innovative software solutions.
